entry.title: Open Insulin
entry.quote: A team of Bay Area biohackers working on newer, simpler, less expensive ways to make insulin.

entry.title: Introducing Mercury OS
entry.quote: A speculative vision of the operating system, driven by humane design principles.

entry.title: Insecure and Unintuitive: How We Need to Fix the UX of Security
entry.quote: The most expensive dialog box in the world costs an Australian bank $750,000,000/year for password resets.

entry.title: The end of mobile
entry.quote: How many people would have these things? Now, we know the answer: everyone. Everyone would have one.
